Professional and Experienced

Inner West Damp services the inner west area of Sydney.

Rodney Wilson started in the business of remedial building works in 1978 in the UK specifically dealing with rising damp. He has since completed his trade in carpentry and his knowledge of building structure is invaluable when diagnosing problems associated with dampness.
